name: ITIDO
tagline: Commitment to Quality and Speed of Service
description:
ITIDO is a software company that provides a full range of software development services, including software and architecture, development, quality assurance, and IT consulting. We are focused on expanding our customers' teams with specific technology and the best talent for the job.
ITIDO also actively supports and develops start-up companies with significant expertise in many industries, know-how, and resources. We at ITIDO want to add value to your business. We do not want to be just the company hired for this job. This will become clear when we start working together.
